TopicTitle: So all my contracts just vanished

Articles.Content: In career mode, and I noticed all my current and archived contracts had disappeared. I could take new ones, but that was it. I do have Contracts plus installed but never use it. I can go back to an earlier save and they are there, but there's a lot of work between now and then I'd rather not lose.
What did you change in your game folder since your last save game?
